author: Stereogum
title: Hear The Shins Debut “The Fear” On A Prarie Home Companion
text: The Shins guested on yesterday’s episode of A Prairie Home Companion, performing a few songs during a live broadcast from Seattle's Paramount Theatre. They played a couple of old songs and a couple of new songs, breaking out new arrangements of Chutes Too Narrow's "Gone For Good" and "Saint Simon" in addition to showing off … More »
